learning_outcomes: Learn how to style hair using different tools.
Master the art of blow-drying and basic hairstyling.
details.certificate: Certificate of Completion in Hairdressing Basics

learning_outcomes: Learn basic nail care and maintenance.
Understand how to design and create nail art.
Familiarize with advanced nail techniques like ombre and 3D designs.
details.certificate: Certificate of Completion in Nail Art and Design

learning_outcomes: Learn various massage techniques and their therapeutic benefits.
Understand different skin care treatments and facials.
Gain knowledge in aromatherapy and relaxation techniques.
details.certificate: Certificate of Completion in Spa and Wellness Therapy

learning_outcomes: Master basic makeup techniques for everyday looks.
Learn how to create professional evening and bridal makeup.
Understand color theory and makeup products.
details.certificate: Certificate of Completion in Makeup Artistry

learning_outcomes: Understand color theory and how to choose hair color.
Learn various hair coloring techniques (e.g., balayage, ombr√©, highlights).
Practice hair coloring on real clients and mannequins.
details.certificate: Certificate of Completion in Hair Coloring Techniques

learning_outcomes: Learn how to perform advanced facials and skin treatments.
Understand the science behind different skin care products.
Master techniques for treating various skin conditions.
details.certificate: Certificate of Completion in Advanced Skin Care Treatments
